work.name: Shanghai Longilat Architectural Design & Research Institute Corporation
work.summary: Responsible for site analysis, project presentation, and document preparation of LDG revitalization projects in the villages around Shanghai .

courses: Recognition of Urban-Architecture (90), Basics of Architectural Design (93), Architectural Design Studio (90), Theory and Methods of Urban Design (93), Urban Sociology (95), Theories of Urban Planning (93), Principles of Landscape Design (97), Urban Economics (93), Planning Research Methodology (94)
